questions.question_text: While facilitating a class an instructor uses a variety of questioning techniques. Which of the following BEST describes the benefits?

choices.D: Keeps the learners engaged as to what is coming next andconveys the importance of theirknowledge.
choices.A: Challenges learners, involves them and helps to monitor their progress.
choices.C: Facilitates group dynamics in a positive way, while encouraging respectful interactions.
choices.B: Establishes an environment that supports learning, and maintains focus on meeting stated learning objectives

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
i saw that question

questions.question_text: Learners are MOST likely to learn a skill successfully when a topic is presented:

choices.B: Just in time for the learner to apply it
choices.C: As part of a summary of related skills
choices.A: In a cluster with other, similar skills
choices.D: As part of a review session prior to an examination

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Correct as it is

questions.question_text:
An instructor uses multiple forms of media to help the class understand a difficult topic. Unfortunately learners are still having a hard time with the concept.
Noticing difficulty, the instructor creates another learning tool to explain the topic another way. Which of the following BEST describes the skill the instructor is using?

choices.C: Adapt learning methods as intended by the course designers
choices.B: Plan and use a variety of reinforcement techniques during training
choices.D: Enhance, substitute or create media as appropriate
choices.A: Create opportunities for learners to contribute to the discussion

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
on this i have to check in details

questions.question_text: An instructor is leading a virtual class when several learners start having significant bandwidth issues that cause them to drop out of the live session. Which of the following represents the BEST solution to the problem?

choices.A: Inform the learners that most of the same material will be covered in the next class session.
choices.C: Request that those learners with bandwidth issues be moved to an in-person live class,
choices.D: Cancel the current session and schedule a make-up class.
choices.B: Have the learners watch a recorded session of the class.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B that's Correct

choices.A: Regularly asking questions during a course helps to identify those that are paying attention.
choices.C: Using a variety of questions during instruction prevents anyone in the group from becoming disinterested with the same question types.
choices.D: Questions asked often during a course will keep learners engaged, it is not important if they do not know the correct answer.
choices.B: Effective use of questions will enhance learners' conceptual understanding; encourage deep thinking and meaningful participation.
